amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce each of the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation accounts by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amounts made available in sundry sections of title IV.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A064) Failed by recorded vote: 100 - 321 (Roll no. 527).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A064) Failed by recorded vote: 100 - 321 (Roll no. 527).
